thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cerner Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.58

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cerner Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.58
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Cerner Corp:
* CERNER REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.57 TO $0.59 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.57 TO $2.73 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.58 * Q4 REVENUE $1.314 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $5.45 BILLION TO $5.65 BILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $1.315 BILLION TO $1.365 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.61, REVENUE VIEW $1.32 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.64, REVENUE VIEW $1.35 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.68, REVENUE VIEW $5.58 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
